website_summaries.verdict: Solves the on-the-go snack problem with delicious convenience.
pros: The classic Cheddar Goldfish Cracker taste packaged in convenient pouches
Each snack pack is 1.5 oz., making it a perfect snack to keep in a diaper bag or in the car for unexpected hunger
Users love the cheddar flavor and kid-friendly size
cons: The classic cheddar flavor may be too salty for some tastes

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunches and snacks
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for school lunches and snacks. I don’t feel like as many crackers get wasted with these. We live in a small town so bulk stores aren’t readily available. This is such a nice option to have. My kids love these. And they’re fresh anytime we get them. We’ve had zero problems. I plan on ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: sadiejane82

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: pleasantly surprised, expected tiny bags, these are a good size!!! A lot of little fishies come in these snack bags! This is a very filling snack for the kids, I find at lunch they wont eat their sandwich if they have all these, so these are usually an after school snack with fruit :) My teenager loves these too. Great price and great product. Will keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: maverick

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized bag. Very tasty!
customer_reviews.text: We loved these! I’ve ordered these 3x. The bag is a great size. I was expecting the smaller snack-sized bags like I’ve seen in our grocery store, but these are like two of those in one bag. They were fresh and tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good before but not so much this time.
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten these before and they were great. But this box several were open or only filled with a few goldfish.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Andrew Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great things for snacks!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what you would it expect it to be! My five year old is a really picky eater, and this is a great snack for on the go, lunch, and just in general. The box came in perfect condition, and the goldfish were solid. I always worry about ordering snacks and having them come smashed, but this was great.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sell

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's Pepperidge Farms. It's Goldfish. How can you go wrong? Use with other snacks at our vacation rental property. Guests, especially yhose with young children, appreciate habing these available. Quick ship. All within expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunchboxes or an afternoon snack
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old daughter loves Goldfish as a snack. The packages makes it easy to throw in her lunchbox for school or to grab when she’s running out the door for a quick snack. I like that it’s a proper amount and keeps her from over eating.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.text: They’re goldfish crackers, what is there to say? I mean if you are under 12 these things call to you. Kid needs a snack? Give him goldfish. Running late and need to satiate hunger? Give kid goldfish. Kid grumpy? Give goldfish. Need to make a phone call? Give kid goldfish. Basically we go through these like water at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: My whole family loves them
customer_reviews.text: My whole house love gold fish. These r great cuz they r snack size. My boys love them and love the flavor. The r good for a snack at home or easy to throw in a bag and take with u on the go for a quick snack out. I also throw them in my husband's lunch for work he loves them to.
customer_reviews.author: Celicia longaberger

customer_reviews.title: Great! Nice snacking size.
customer_reviews.text: Great crackers and I like the size of these 45 oz. packs. Perfect for snacking. Great with soups. I almost always have these on hand. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Bron

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Almost every single bag of goldfish that I’ve consumed after purchasing this box tastes great. I’ve purchased this box 4 times now, and put it in my cart to purchase it a fifth. I would definitely recommend purchasing this because it’s a good amount of goldfish for the price, also it’s fresh and majorityof the goldfish crackers are still intact, except for maybe one or two. It’s a cracker so it’s expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit with the grandkids.
customer_reviews.text: I send these to my granddaughter that lives in another state, all the time. I really like the portioning of the snack size. I use to send her the big giant carton of them, but that size seemed to go stale, and these are just as great of a deal. Plus free prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Always loved goldfish when I was a little kid
customer_reviews.text: Always loved goldfish when I was a little kid. Good snack to eat and small packages are good for on the go. Now you don't have to buy ziplock bags and put them inside and waste even more time. These small pouches are easy to carry and provide stress free fun.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M

customer_reviews.title: I will likely drown in goldfish
customer_reviews.text: My wife persuaded me to buy goldfish in bulk on the grounds that it'd be cheaper, but in reality, I now consume exponentially more goldfish than would be advisable. Proceed with tasty caution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snack
customer_reviews.text: I love the bulk value of these my kids take these in there lunch every day. The are a wholesome snack that is not loaded with sugar. The some in the perfect size package so there are not as ton of calories either. Love them will by it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Gambill

customer_reviews.title: Beware of open packages in box
customer_reviews.text: The problem showed up when I opened the box and there were loose goldfish everywhere. I am using these in a goody bag for a birthday party and now I'm not sure I will use it simply because one of the bags had to have been opened while packaging the product. This is unacceptable when in today's world people are insane enough to put substances inside of packages. I will be requesting a refund or some type of answer as to why this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Trish M

customer_reviews.title: SHORT EXPIRATION........
customer_reviews.text: Same with these as the chips I recived...Has a ONE month expiration. The stores have several months expiration. I bought 2 cases and had 2 sent to my grandson. Never again.... Unless you want to eat them right away and several at a time, I wouldn't recommend buying....
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Ok snacks
customer_reviews.text: Kids like them and I eat them from time to time. Overall acceptable snacks compared to many others. Nothing fancy but you will chew it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack for Kids Parties!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described and promptly. Ordered to include in the keepsake cups for my grandchild’s 1st Birthday. The kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: STK

customer_reviews.title: Cheddar Fishy mania
customer_reviews.text: It came quick in excellent condition with a expiration date of 3/20 of total freshness. Perfect for the road trip or the next big earth quake.
customer_reviews.author: boomer for hemp

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack !
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the look-out for a healthy snack. This is one !! Great taste from a great company ! And the size is great for snacking or lunches.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Willard

customer_reviews.title: Has GMO Products
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the Goldfish crackers, but was disappointed to learn that they have a number of genetically modified ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these as well as the grandchildren! These are a great snack to have around for when the grandchildren visit!
customer_reviews.author: dolphyno5

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, larger size bags
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, the bags are larger than the size you get at the grocery store. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Gone gold fishin
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, package was good, product was great. Worked perfectly for class valentine’s.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No salt on them.
customer_reviews.text: They taste a little weird because they don't have salt on them. I prefer the ones from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lunches
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos pack their lunch each day and these are a great, easy staple for them to grab. Just the right amount for lunchtime!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: To make my granddaughter happy
customer_reviews.text: Send them to my granddaughter. She just loves the goldfish as a treat for when her mother picks her up from school .
customer_reviews.author: Frieda Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Great road trip sack
customer_reviews.text: Great for road trips. Easy and convenient packaging. Will buy again. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Bags open in box
customer_reviews.text: There were several bags that were open at the seam. Goldfish everywhere in the box
customer_reviews.author: Em S

customer_reviews.title: Great for snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Part of a prime pantry order. The price was right and expiration date a long way out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Bag sizes are large for smaller children. Good for on the go though. Expensive without the Amazon coupon
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great school snack
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this snack for school, soccer and whatever else they are doing. Overall the individual bags are a good size. I found when the teachers ask for class snacks this case is a good size to order and send In. I also feel amazon has this priced reasonably. I noticed smaller box sizes with smaller individual bags in the stores around me have a higher cost per ounce.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bentsen

customer_reviews.title: Not live fish
customer_reviews.text: Received these and immediately put them into water. Can’t believe they were shipped out of water. Fish never moved and I feel that they arrived and were not alive. After a few days they were just mush in the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Starcher

customer_reviews.title: Eatible
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointment to find out they weren't actual goldfish, but they are good.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaGirl

customer_reviews.title: A nice size sack
customer_reviews.text: A nice size sack. The pack looks small, but it is so much more filling than a bag of chips. There a lots of little smiling fishes in each pack. Thirty in a box = some for the kids and some for my work snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark ö¿ö

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's Halloween party at school and the kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: Helped prevent goldfish smuggling
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 18 month old grand daughter who loves goldfishes so much that she smuggled some out of day care stuffed down her onesie.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to use for on the go snacks... Just the right portion for kids!
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: great for kids snacks (school age)
customer_reviews.text: Looking for toddler size. This is alittle bigger. My error in size.
customer_reviews.author: Hello2u

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product fir kids and adults. Good flavor. Cute fish shape good to carry with you. I keep these in my pantry at all times.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Halloween
customer_reviews.text: I love goldfish so I decided to buy these for Halloween treats.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Box of goldfish
customer_reviews.text: No actual fish were harmed in the packaging of these goldfish
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Seems O K
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fish, brought to Scout Family Night, went quickly, 30 bags I think,
customer_reviews.author: D.L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly large bags
customer_reviews.text: Fairly large bags- much bigger than the 12 pack I get at Safeway. Bought for my son's soccer team and school classroom snack rotations.
customer_reviews.author: KaileyMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Great for lunch snack or after work. Add to homemade snack mix.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Fauth

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: The price and the amount are ideal for my hungry fifth-graders.
customer_reviews.author: DNice

customer_reviews.title: Since I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: I loved these since i was a kid, now older, these offer portion control! I also like that you get more in this and they take up less space than the 30 OX jug. These are also packaged alone so they don't go stale. Especially love when there is a 20% off coupon!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. There is lots in each bag. Both of the children in my house - my husband and my daughter are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: raproia

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great snack for kids. I always try to keep on hand for a good snack.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Crackers
customer_reviews.text: Good for a quick snack. These had a lot more individual goldfish crackers in each bag than I was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Olive12345

customer_reviews.title: These are not little bags, get them while you can
customer_reviews.text: Big bags inside worth every penny. 30 bGz that is a whole month.
customer_reviews.author: cW

customer_reviews.title: Shorted me out of 3 bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and counted them. They shorted me out of 3 bags. Not happy about that!

customer_reviews.title: Fresh items
customer_reviews.text: Box was beat up but items were nice and fresh-thank you

customer_reviews.title: there salty
customer_reviews.text: they are so salty buy i ate them all i wouldn't buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Brayan

customer_reviews.title: Great for car snacks.
customer_reviews.text: This is our number one go to snack for in the car drives. We have two boys the love gold fish. It’s easy to keep two small bags in the car for as needed use.
customer_reviews.author: cdl

customer_reviews.title: Completely as expected. Nice big box of snack sized goldfish bags.
customer_reviews.text: I mean-- they're goldfish, how can you go wrong? Great to grab as a snack before long drives. Word of warning- do NOT let them sit in spilled water in a hot car. The smell will overwhelm you and you may never be able to enjoy another goldfish cracker again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great size for kids
customer_reviews.text: There were so many in the box I gave half of the box to my grandson
customer_reviews.author: Dailey trouble

customer_reviews.title: A lot for your money good deal
customer_reviews.text: Love these they are addictive good product good price will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Always fresh. Just enough in a individual package.
customer_reviews.author: dpuz

customer_reviews.title: This is one of our favorite snacks. I don't feel guilty about giving them ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite snacks. I don't feel guilty about giving them to the kids. The pouch is larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Treenag

customer_reviews.title: LIKE THEM OK
customer_reviews.text: Like that there are individual packages of Goldfish. I just don't love the taste of them like I thought I would. But they are OK to say I like them. But I prefer another cheese snack better.
customer_reviews.author: ladyinclover

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: These are a guilty pleasure. I love them, they are better for you than most snacks, and the individual packages are perfect for portion control. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter’s must have daily snack. Always fresh and looks forward to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Don’t last long in our house- on the go fish is a plus!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fishing for a snack try these
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite go to snacks Not overly cheesy calories not to bad and also good to keep in purse or bag for kids I also ate these when I had morning sickness and they settled the tummy
customer_reviews.author: Lelani Clark

customer_reviews.title: Goldfish Crackers
customer_reviews.text: Definitely for the Goldfish lover household. My husband loves this snack and is already requesting that I get another box. Fresh and package well

customer_reviews.title: Good value-
customer_reviews.text: I love these- fresh- tasty- in separate packs- I carry them to an assisted care- For my mother to share at Bingo- other theme events- they make perfect snacks size-

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! And I didn't have to go to the store

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, sent to my Neice in college to enjoy as she studies!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Goldfish crackers

customer_reviews.title: REALLY?
customer_reviews.text: they are goldfish crackers! what's not to love about these things! :)

customer_reviews.title: Best best buy
customer_reviews.text: Best best buy!!! Goldfish typically cost $5 fo a pack of 9 in grocery store. The pack of 45 was super cheap much better buy, somewhere around $19 through prime pantry.
customer_reviews.author: mamacell

customer_reviews.title: yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Do people actually not like Goldfish??... Cause i'm like obsessed and this pack, feeds my obsession... literally. Hahaha Perfect snack packets size too! just the right amount to remind you when to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Sulina Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great, I'm buying more for TV snacks
customer_reviews.text: Great, I'm buying more for TV snacks. Light and not over filling, I just have to keep my eyes on my grandkids, they disappear fast.

customer_reviews.title: My wife eats a lot of these so this economy ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife eats a lot of these so this economy pack allows her to take them in her lunch and not have a large open box or bag laying around getting stale.
customer_reviews.author: BigMac52

customer_reviews.title: $0.33 per bag is way better than $1.00 a bag at work.
customer_reviews.text: It’d be cool if the had extreme pizza or something in a box like this. I add Cayanne pepper to the bags.

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: These packages are a good size, just small enough for kids but not too big to ruin their appetite.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I was told it was good.

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy cracker deliciousness

customer_reviews.title: YUM

product_meta.title: Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Cheddar Crackers, 45 oz. Multi-pack Box, 1.5 oz. Snack Packs (Pack of 30)
product_meta.description:
The Snack that Smiles Back: When it comes to Goldfish crackers, you can feel good about serving your favorite snacks. All of our cheese varieties, like cheddar, are baked with real cheese, and Goldfish crackers are made with no artificial preservatives or flavors. The snack pack contains 30 single-serve pouches of our classic Cheddar Goldfish crackers. Everyone loves Goldfish crackers – they're tasty and fun! These 1.5 oz. single-serve packs are perfect for on-the-go snacking or to pack in lunches.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :12.8 x 9.4 x 6.5 inches; 3.41 Pounds
 * Item model number :200140004613
 * Date First Available :January 4, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Pepperidge Farm (Snacks)
 * ASIN :B01A5GQ192

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars1,999 ratings The Snack that Smiles Back: When it comes to Goldfish crackers, you can feel good about serving your favorite snacks. All of our cheese varieties, like cheddar, are baked with real cheese, and Goldfish crackers are made with no artificial preservatives or flavors. The snack pack contains 30 single-serve pouches of our classic Cheddar Goldfish crackers. Everyone loves Goldfish crackers – they're tasty and fun! These 1.5 oz. single-serve packs are perfect for on-the-go snacking or to pack in lunches.
feature_bullets: Playful crackers baked with a smile
30 single-serve packs in Cheddar flavor (1.5 oz. each)
Perfect for on the go snacking
